title: La Grange
summary:
La Grange is a detached house with a view over nature and a private roof-top SPA for 8 people. It is classified as a 5-star furnished holiday home.

Access to the swimming pool is optional, and can be booked for two hours at a time.
The swimming pool is covered, size 4X10, and is reserved for you during the booking period.

You'll be welcomed in the 80 M2 living room with a dining area for up to 16 people.
The billiard table, lounge and connected TV, sofa and armchairs guarantee comfort and relaxation.
A reading area and board games have been set up under the grand staircase that takes you smoothly upstairs.
A small bar with beer pump completes the facilities.

The separate kitchen is perfectly equipped for cooking and entertaining. It also opens onto the outside.

Toilet with washbasin on the first floor.

Upstairs, 4 bedrooms, each with 1 bed (180x200) that can be converted into single beds (90x200), a shower room and WC in each room.
Toilets are separate from the bathrooms in 2 of the 4 bedrooms.
Beds are of course made up on arrival, and towels and bathrobes are prepared for you.

Two fully-equipped outdoor terraces, one of which is always in the shade, with furniture for eating and relaxing, and a barbecue in season.
Bicycles are available on loan free of charge, and itineraries are referenced.
description:
Between Touraine and Berry, Le Hameau de la Closerie welcomes you to its 11 hectares of 100% natural surroundings.

Renovated in the purest tradition of the region, the Hameau offers comfort and charm, so you can enjoy the countryside, nature and the gentle way of life, in an unspoilt natural setting, at the end of nowhere.

The landscaped garden integrates natural spaces and places to take a break in the heart of nature. The private Discgolf course is freely accessible, and the multi-activity field is ideal for volleyball or pétanque. The private pond is a 10-minute walk away, with no-kill fishing.

Walking trails are accessible directly from the house, and the itineraries are referenced.

Ideal starting point for discovering the Beauval Zoo 30 minutes away, the Royal City of Loches 20 minutes away, the Royal Château of Amboise or the Château des Dames in Chenonceau 40 minutes away, not forgetting the Brenne Regional Nature Park 20 minutes away, the Futuroscope 40 minutes away or the Château de Valençay 40 minutes away. Less than 30 minutes away by car: Montrésor, Montpoupon, Bridoré, Azay le Ferron.

Within an hour, you can visit Blois, Chambord, Azay le Rideau, Villandry and Cheverny for the most famous.

The all-inclusive price includes: bed linen and towels for the stay, cleaning at the end of the stay (excluding dishes and rubbish), heating and electricity with reasonable consumption - if the gîte is heated electrically, you have 25 Kwh per day (any excess must be paid on site to the hosts).

reviews.author: Brice
reviews.body:
Martine nous a très bien accueilli  et nous as exceptionnellement laissé arriver plus tôt pour nous rendre service.
Les lieux sont sublimes et idéals pour ceux et celles qui recherche un lieux calme et naturel.
La verdure des champs vous entourent. Le chants des oiseaux vous berce et les embrouilles des grenouilles vous amusent.
La Grange est rénovée avec goût et tout y est. Vous ne manquerez de rien. Les chambres sont cosy et bien équipées.
Nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir et un grand merci Martine pour sa bonne humeur et son enthousiasme.

reviews.author: Murielle
reviews.title: Superbe séjour
reviews.body:
Nous avons passé un excellent séjour entre amis dans ce gîte très confortable, propre et au calme.
Nous y reviendrons avec grand plaisir.

reviews.author: Aurebeau
reviews.title: Très beau gîte spacieux et ultra confortable
reviews.body: Notre séjour s'est merveilleusement passé avec la découverte du spa intérieur, de la boutique et des ballades à pied sans parler de l'intérieur du logement la Grange décoré avec soin où chaque pièce révèle une atmosphère différente. On s'y sent bien, on n'a plus envie de quitter ce bel endroit! Martine accueille chaleureusement ses hôtes avec sourire et bonne humeur!

reviews.author: Sandrine
reviews.title: Merveilleux séjour dans un cadre idyllique
reviews.body: Magnifique maison, décorée avec beaucoup de goût. Tout y était pour nous donner envie d'y rester. De fait, nous avons peu visité mais tout ce que nous avons vu était charmant (château de Montrésor, Clos Lucé, cité royale de Loches). Notre hôtesse était charmante, très à l'écoute, et c'est un lieu idéal pour les amoureux des animaux. Merci encore

reviews.author: Bob
reviews.title: Escapade nature
reviews.body: Un excellent gîte avec tout le nécessaire. Nous avons été très bien accueillis et le gîte est très confortable. Une très belle  prestation. Le seul bémol, mais ce n’est pas la faute de Marine, le frigidaire ne fonctionnait plus et les victuailles que nous avions apporté en ont un peu pâti. Cependant, je recommande vivement ce gîte si vous voulez passer un agréable séjour.

title: La Maison du Launay
summary: In the village of Ploubazlanec, close to Bréhat, beautiful renovated neo-Bretonne house for 8 people.
description:
In the picturesque village of Ploubazlanec, this old neo-Breton house has been beautifully renovated by an architect, and the result is a real success. With its bright, generous spaces, this house is distinguished by its contemporary layout and a few pieces of antique furniture, creating a unique atmosphere. Its plus? its three terraced areas for relaxing outside at any time of day, in complete tranquillity. From the kitchen and the upper terrace, you'll enjoy a beautiful view of the sea horizon, especially on sunny days. You're just a stone's throw from the local shops and restaurants. And if you want to discover the region, there's a whole host of sights just a few kilometers away: the pier for the Ile de Bréhat (2.5 km), Paimpol (3.9 km) and its busy quays all year round, and Beauport Abbey (7 km). Also worth a visit is Pontrieux, a pretty town full of character (21 km).

Your 3-level vacation rental includes :

First floor:

Entrance hall with glass roof, large living room with overhead projector and connected speakers, well-equipped fitted kitchen with Sea view (gas and induction piano stove, air fryer...), 1 bedroom (1 bed 160x200), bathroom (shower, bath and toilet), other separate toilet.

First floor: large landing leading to 3 bedrooms (2 beds 90x200 which can be twinned into 1 bed 180x200), (1 bed 160x200) and at the end of the corridor (1 bed 180x200), shower room (shower and wc) and separate wc.

Basement:

Laundry room with washing machine and dryer.

Outside:

From the living room, access to a well-sheltered terrace with relaxation lounge, sun loungers and garden furniture.

From the kitchen, a staircase gives access to the courtyard with another set of garden furniture.

Upstairs, access to a terrace with summer kitchen.

Private parking at the property entrance (4 cars).

Le petit plus : Vue sur la mer depuis la cuisine et de d'une des 4 chambres ;)

title: Le Moulin d'Emile
summary: In need of relaxation, come to the Bussolles gites in the Allier (Lapalisse, Vichy) near our waterfall, the pond with its landscaped surroundings awaits our fishing friends (free fishing) and the bonus of being close to the INCONTOURNABLE Pal, not forgetting our animals - in a word, PARADISE ON EARTH!
description:
Large Holiday cottage in miller's house, near the old mill, independent gite (exposed stone and wood decor) with waterfall nearby.

First floor: living room with wood-burning stove, kitchen (traditional and pod coffee makers), shower room, separate toilet.

First floor: 1 bedroom (1 x 2-person bed), 1 bedroom (1 x 160-person bed), 1 bedroom (1 x 2-person bed), mezzanine (3 x 1-person beds) with reading area, bathroom (bath), separate wc.

Electric heating. Green space with waterfall (2500m²). A variety of activities are available, including table tennis and a basketball court.

A wooden Cabin for little elves. Boules pitch. Donkeys and ponies. Free fishing in the owner's large fish pond (swimming prohibited) 200m away. Picnic facilities available. UNESCO-listed City of Vichy and its relaxing baths 30 km away. Le Pal is 37 km away. Vulcania 100 km away, with the Chaine des Puys (UNESCO heritage site). Bike rental in Lapalisse 6km. Possibility of 2 extra people at 15€/person/night. Non-smoking house.

Holiday cottage benefits: Linen supplied (tablecloths and tea towels), gas supplied, 1st stere of wood offered.

Heating and electricity at customer's expense, to be paid on site at end of stay.
priceIncludes: 8k electricity per day GAS AND WOOD

reviews.title: Calme et confort
reviews.body:
Vous êtes à la recherche d'un coin sympa, en famille ou entre amis, aucun doute, le moulin d'Emile vous satisfera amplement.
Séjour campagnard avec tout le confort, séjour pêche avec un superbe étang poissonneux ( carpe de 6 kg), séjour avec enfants, poneys, ânes, jeux extérieurs et intérieurs.
Un gîte spacieux, des fauteuils, des chaises, des équipements cuisine en nombre. Chambres et salles de bains et wc propres... que du bonheur.
Ajouter à cela des propriétaires accueillants et à votre écoute.

reviews.body: Des propriétaires attentionnés et sympathiques nous ont accueillis pour fêter Noël en famille dans leur gîte très confortable, en pierres apparentes, décoré avec goût. Un feu préparé dans un poêle Godin avait réchauffé la maison et un sapin et des décorations de Noël nous attendaient. Ce gîte peut accueillir 8 personnes avec ses 3 chambres et ses lits dans la mezzanine. La cuisine avec sa déco blanche et bleue est bien agencée et bien équipée (assiettes, couverts et ustensiles de cuisine en nombre suffisants). Nous recommandons ce gîte pour son confort, sa nature environnante, sa cascade, sa proximité de Lapalisse...

title: La Derouannière
summary:
Cross the hills of the Mayenne region, and discover this large detached gîte in the countryside.
You'll love the large dining room (26m²) with fireplace, living room (21m²) with large sofa and 120cm TV, fully-equipped kitchen (fridge, dishwasher, 4-burner gas stove, oven, microwave, kettle, coffee maker) and utility room (freezer and washing machine).
Sleeping accommodation: 4 bedrooms (10 to 12m² each), including 2 on the ground floor (each with 1 bed 140*190), 1 bathroom with bath and washbasin, 1 separate toilet. Upstairs: 2 bedrooms each with a large closet, 1 with 2 beds 90*200 and 1 with 1 bed 140*190; 1 independent wc; 1 shower room with shower cubicle, 2 basins.
The house is surrounded by a large garden with terrace, a garage shelter protecting 1 petanque court, possibility of eating and playing, barbecue, garden furniture and deckchair. Children's swing, orchard and vegetable garden.
All shops are 13km away, in Villaines-la-Juhel.
For family fun, take advantage of the large leisure park at Sillé le Guillaume (13km away), Sillé-plage, with its large lake for swimming, pedal boats, canoes, surf-bikes, zip-line, laser-game, mini-golf, pony-trekking...
In Averton (15km away), the Perles site offers a fishing area (with fishing permit).
Mayenne is a great hiking area, with Mont des Avaloirs (the highest peak in the Armorican Massif), Montaigu and many other forest and country paths.
In Mayenne and Sarthe, you can also discover the "Petites cités de caractères" (small towns of character) of Sainte-Suzanne, Sillé-le-Guillaume, Fresnay-sur-Sarthe, Entrammes...
Possibility of visiting Mont Saint Michel (130km).
The owners will be happy to point you in the direction of local producers and markets to sample the produce of the Mayenne region.
description:

Les grands espaces extérieurs sont un vrai plus pour le stationnement ou comme terrain de jeux . Pour finir, les loueurs sont accueillants, généreux et nous avons passé une belle semaine ...

title: Gîtes de France® - Au Bonheur Normand
summary: Spacious accommodation for 8 people in the heart of the Pays de Bray, a stone's throw from the Avenue Verte.
description:
In the heart of the Pays de Bray, this detached Holiday cottage offers a peaceful, leafy setting, perfect for a stay with family or friends. Just a stone's throw away, you'll find the old wash-house, a charming reminder of the local heritage, ideal for a bucolic break - whether you want to soak your feet or let your four-legged friends roam around.

Just a few minutes away, Neufchâtel-en-Bray is the gateway to the Avenue Verte, an ideal route for walking and cycling through the Normandy bocage. With its blend of nature, heritage and outdoor activities, it's the ideal place to recharge your batteries while exploring the region's riches.

Please note that this Holiday cottage is not All inclusive: some options are extra.

First floor:

large living room with :

- living room, 105cm TV, DVD player, radio/CD player, fireplace with insert,

- kitchen (4-burner gas stove and oven, microwave, dishwasher),

- shower room with 70x70cm shower (door opening 40cm) and toilet,

- bedroom (1 double bed 140x190cm).

- bedroom 1 double bed 140x190cm, baby bed with bars, changing table,

- bedroom 1 double bed 140x190cm,

- bedroom 2 single beds 90x190cm,

- bathroom with shower, bath and toilet.

Baby Equipment: high chair, bathtub, chair seat, cot with mattress, changing table, potty.....

title: Gîte des 8 fées
summary:
The Holiday cottage des Fées, in the heart of the Vosges saônoises, welcomes you for a stay dedicated to tranquility and disconnection. Here, no internet or superfluous waves: you take the time to slow down, to breathe, to find yourself.
In the heart of the Plateau des Mille Étangs, this beautifully appointed Holiday cottage welcomes you to its unspoilt natural setting. Built with respect for local traditions, it features hemp and natural lime walls, ecological wood paints (Biofa brand) and pure, untreated borehole water drawn from a depth of 240 meters.
description:
The Holiday cottage can accommodate up to 6 people in standard configuration, and up to 8 adults with the independent annex, located right next to the main building (see last 3 photos). This additional room has a double bed (160x190), private bathroom and toilet. A dormitory not included in the official capacity can also accommodate up to three Kids in extra beds, on request from the owner (extra charge).

All inclusive for your comfort: Beds made on arrival, Bathroom linen provided, utilities included, end-of-stay cleaning provided. Travel light, everything is provided. Non-smoking Holiday cottage.

The first floor comprises a cosy living room with open fireplace (wood supply optional at extra cost), a fully-equipped kitchen (oven, dishwasher, washing machine, etc.) and a comfortable sitting area with sofa and flat-screen TV. Two bedrooms are available: one with a double bed (160x190) and private shower room, the other with two single beds (90x190). An independent shower room and separate toilet complete this level.

Upstairs, a bright lounge opens directly onto a private terrace. It can be used as an extra bedroom, thanks to a convertible sofa (bed 160), ideal for a peaceful stay in complete privacy.

An upstairs room can accommodate up to three extra beds for Kids (outside official capacity) - On request, owner 0978350165.

Outside, two terraces with garden furniture and barbecue are available to enjoy the warm weather. A private parking space is also available.

In addition, on request, you can take advantage of :

organic bread delivered on site,

access to a private fishing pond (participation required, limited to 2 hours).

A version of the Holiday cottage without the independent annex is also available for 6 people under reference H70G030403.

Non-smoking Holiday cottage.

An upstairs room can accommodate up to three extra beds for Kids (outside official capacity) - On request, owner 0978350165. Please note that this is a dormitory and does not have doors like a traditional bedroom.

title: L'Estrée
summary: In the heart of the Berry region, in a charming village with shops and a pleasant Lake with supervised swimming in summer, this Holiday cottage welcomes you in a peaceful setting, just a stone's throw from the Château de Palluau-sur-Indre. Ideally located at the gateway to the Brenne Regional Nature Park and close to Loches, Buzançais and the famous Beauval Zoo, it's the perfect base for exploring the treasures of the Val de Creuse-Val d'Anglin.
description:
This Bungalow, ideal for a stay with family or friends, welcomes you in a secure environment with enclosed courtyard to the front and fully enclosed garden to the rear.

You'll find a beautiful entrance hall with storage space, a laundry room, and a vast 53 m² living room bathed in light, combining an open-plan fitted kitchen, a convivial dining room and a comfortable lounge.

The night space comprises :

Two communicating bedrooms with their own shower room and WC: 1 single bed and a sofa bed for one person in the first bedroom, and 2 single beds in the second.

One bedroom with a 2-person bed,

A second independent shower room with WC,

And another bedroom with a double bed, private shower room and WC.

For your moments of relaxation or activity, take advantage of an equipped Sports hall (treadmill, 2 indoor bikes), as well as numerous gaming rooms for young and old.

Outside, two well-exposed terraces (north and south) let you enjoy every moment of the day. Private parking inside the property.

Electric heating with billing according to consumption.

Electric heating (invoiced according to consumption)

The accommodation will be reduced from 10 to 8 people at the end of the 2022 season, but you will still have access to 10 beds.

title: des Voisins
summary: In Sologne Bourbonnaise, enjoy a warm family holiday in this large Countryside house, between forests, ponds and cultural discoveries of the Allier region.
description:
In the village of Chapeau, the Gîte des Voisins opens its doors to you in an old farmhouse typical of the Sologne Bourbonnaise region, carefully restored with respect for the original materials. With its half-timbered walls, cob walls and wood-burning stove, it's a friendly place to gather with friends or family.

Surrounded by forest paths, this large detached house invites you to relax and discover. Just a few minutes away, you can visit Le Pal (12 km), one of France's most beautiful animal and amusement parks, stroll through the historic streets of Moulins (20 km) or treat yourself to a Wellbeing break in Bourbon-Lancy, a renowned spa town 28 km away.

The large outdoor area (not enclosed) will delight young and old alike for moments of sharing and relaxation. Kids can play while you enjoy a break on the sunny terrace.

Ground floor: kitchen, living room, 2 shower rooms and 2 separate WCs, 4 bedrooms for 2 people.

For a stay with family or friends in the Allier, this Holiday cottage in Chapeau combines charm, comfort and authenticity in the heart of the Countryside.

Holiday cottage extras: Housekeeping included, linen and towels, beds made on arrival.

Heating and electricity to be paid for on site, at the end of your stay.

reviews.body: Séjourner au gîte des Voisins fut très agréable et nous y reviendrons avec plaisir. L'accueil des propriétaires est très chaleureux, le gîte remarquable. Nous avons beaucoup apprécié le fait que la maison soit entourée de nature, c'est aussi reposant que rassurant pour nos deux petites filles qui se sont bien amusées à l'extérieur ; et que dire des biches qui se sont approchées du gîte ! À l'intérieur, tout est de plain-pied et suffisamment vaste pour chacun. Nous serons donc heureux de retrouver le gîte des Voisins pour un séjour que nous espérons cette fois plus long, afin d'en profiter davantage.

title: La maison verte
summary: Located on the border of the Allier and Nièvre departments, ideal for a getaway with family or friends.
description:
At the entrance, ring the period bell and discover the tastefully renovated interior... Let yourself be tempted!

Formerly the residence of a colonel in the French colonies, La Maison Verte has a timeless, warm atmosphere.

Situated in the heart of the village, this house is full of character, and its large, walled grounds (2000 m²) are ideal for relaxing and enjoying the great outdoors. How about a game of table tennis or badminton?

The large garden lets you make the most of fine weather, and enjoy your meals on the terrace, while the spacious, light-filled interior provides comfort and authenticity.

In season, you can warm up by the wood-burning stove after a walk in the Countryside.

Street parking is available, and for electric vehicle drivers, a charging station is just a few steps from the Holiday cottage.

You can store your bikes, motorcycles, baby carriages or Fishing rods in an outbuilding at your disposal.

First floor: the central hallway leads to the living room, dining room and kitchen. 1 bedroom with double bed and 2 bedrooms with 2 single beds and a shower room with separate toilet. The bedroom with single beds overlooking the garden and the kitchen offer direct access to the outside.

1st floor: enjoy the reading corner. 1 bedroom with double bed and bathroom (bath).

Sancoins 12 km. Nevers 45 km. Tronçais Forest 20 km. All shops in the village. Street Art City 1.5km away.

Holiday cottage benefits: Bed linen and towels provided. Beds made on arrival. Wood provided. Heating and electricity at customer's expense, to be paid on site at end of stay.

summary: Located 15 km from Montluçon and 10 km from the Forêt de Tronçais (one of Europe's most beautiful oak forests). Canal de Berry and its greenway.

First floor: kitchen with dining area, living room, wood-burning stove, 1 bedroom (1 double bed), bathroom (bath and shower), separate toilet.

First floor: 1 bedroom (2 x 2-person beds), 1 bedroom (1 x 2-person bed), bathroom (shower/wc). Electric heating. Laundry room (washing machine, tumble dryer, 3-drawer freezer).

Large semi-enclosed green space (2ha) with orchard, lawn, courtyard and 2 sheltered terraces, barbecue. Children's swing.  Mini farm (1 donkey, dwarf goats and 1 Vietnamese pig, Ouessant and Cameroon sheep, chickens, geese, ducks...). All amenities in Vallon en Sully and its SNCF train station 5 km, Cosne d'Allier 15 km, Cher river, Berry canal and its greenway 4 km away.

summary: Welcome to the "Gîtes de Noailly", come and stay in this delightful detached stone family home, located in the heart of a small hamlet. The shared swimming pool overlooks lush green meadows and Douglas fir forests. In summer, July/August and Christmas, stay smart and avoid weekend traffic jams: arrivals and departures are from TUESDAY to TUESDAY.
description:
Gite with shared swimming pool offering superb views over lush green valleys. Enclosed private grounds with trees, beautiful views over the countryside (right of way for owners to feed horses and maintain pool). Ideal for relaxation and leisure.

Personalized, harmonious 140 m² gîte on first floor + first floor, kitchen, living room with lounge, fireplace, dining area and bar, 3 bedrooms and a mezzanine with 140cm bed and office area. Sleeps 8. Pleasant corner relaxation arranged under veranda. Central heating.

Swimming pool shared with "de Chloé" gite. Pension for horses available for a fee.

Au plaisir de vous accueillir à nouveau pour un prochain séjour d'automne (ou d'hiver !) chaleureux.

title: La maison de Marguerite
summary: Ideally located in the center of the village, along the main street, this cosy Holiday cottage can accommodate up to 8 people (or 5 people under reference: H21G030740). Entirely renovated with care by the owner, a beekeeper in his spare time, he has preserved the soul of the house by using noble materials and preserving the authenticity of the site. The result is a home full of character, where modern comforts and old-world charm meet in harmony.
description:
The ground floor features a large, bright living room with wood-burning stove (wood supplied) and TV, and a fully-equipped open-plan kitchen, bathed in light thanks to a large bay window giving direct access to the garden. A bedroom with a 140cm bed and a shower room with walk-in shower and toilet complete this level.

Upstairs, 2 bedrooms, each able to accommodate three people. Bathroom with walk-in shower and separate WC.

1 pet allowed at a supplement of €10 per night per animal.

Outside, you'll love the fully enclosed garden, as well as the terrace under the barn, with garden furniture and a charcoal barbecue for successful outdoor meals. Private, gated parking in the courtyard, and a secure area for storing your bicycles. Laundry room with washing machine and tumble dryer.

All the shops you need are just a stone's throw away, including a mini-market right opposite the Holiday cottage, for convenient, stress-free living.

Baby equipment on request: Umbrella bed, high chair and bathtub.

Beds made on arrival, linen and end-of-stay cleaning included.

Charges and extras: towels: 5 €/pers. Electricity according to meter reading (8 kwh/day included). Pet supplement: €10 per night and per pet.

A great place to be in the heart of the Forest National Park, with family or friends, in a peaceful setting, while enjoying village life.

The house is not accessible to people with reduced mobility.

reviews.title: Séjour en famille très agréable !!

Nous avons été très bien accueillis, y compris avec des produits régionaux disposés à notre attention à l'arrivée !

Nous avons passé une très belle semaine en famille.

ownerReply.text: Merci Sophie ! Nous sommes ravis que la Maison de Marguerite vous ait permis de fabriquer de chouettes souvenirs auprès de ceux que vous aimez ! Au plaisir de vous recevoir à nouveau ! Qui sait ? !

reviews.title: Ce gîte est un véritable petit bijou !
reviews.body: La maison est incroyablement bien aménagée et équipée. Les murs en pierre protègent de la chaleur et tout est pensé pour passer de doux moments en famille. Merci Bénédicte et Alain !

ownerReply.text: Merci beaucoup Céline ! Nous sommes ravis que la Maison de Marguerite vous ait plu ! Ce sont de belles rencontres comme la vôtre qui nous laissent penser que nous avons bien fait de nous lancer dans cette aventure ! Au plaisir de vous revoir dans notre belle région !
ownerReply.author: Bénédicte, the owner

reviews.author: Justyna
reviews.title: Fantastic stay in a beautiful home
reviews.body:
Notre séjour à la Maison de Marguerite a été encore meilleur que ce que nous imaginions ! La maison est magnifique, très spacieuse et aménagée avec énormément de goût, aussi bien à l’intérieur qu’à l’extérieur. On sent que chaque détail a été pensé avec amour.
Les deux superbes salles de bain et les excellents lits nous ont permis de dormir comme des rois. Même par temps chaud, la maison reste agréablement fraîche, ce qui rend le séjour encore plus confortable.
Côté équipement, c’est un sans-faute : tout est prévu, absolument rien ne manque ! La région est superbe : en face, un supermarché proposant des produits régionaux ; juste à côté, un petit parc avec une rivière ; la nature à portée de main ; et à seulement une heure de Dijon, avec ses nombreuses abbayes et richesses culturelles.
Les hôtes sont charmants, très sympathiques et accueillants, ce qui rend l’expérience encore plus agréable.
Le tout dans un cadre d’une grande tranquillité. Une expérience authentique, chaleureuse et reposante… Si je pouvais mettre 10 étoiles, je le ferais sans hésiter !

ownerReply.text:
Votre commentaire nous touche beaucoup, Justyna ! Nous sommes ravis que La Maison de Marguerite vous ait plu et que vous ayez passé un agréable séjour dans notre belle région ! Au plaisir de vous revoir !
Bénédicte et Alain

title: Le Four à pain
summary: In Berry, near Châteauroux, 20 minutes from the House of George Sand, the medieval Château de Sarzay, Argenton-sur-Creuse ( La Venise Verte du Berry ) , Gargilesse-Dampierre , St Benoît du Sault (one of France's most beautiful villages).
description:
Right next to an 18th-century château overlooking the green Countryside, detached single-storey house in a peaceful setting.

Living-dining room, fitted and equipped kitchen, bathroom and separate toilet. From the hallway you can access 4 bedrooms (2 with 2 single beds that can be joined together to form a double bed, and 2 with a double bed), a shower room with WC. Separate

Outside: a large garden with an arbour.

The price includes: bed linen for the stay, end-of-stay cleaning (excluding crockery and rubbish), central Electric heating and electricity with reasonable consumption.

The price does not include bathroom linen.

Optional extras

title: Gîtes de France® - Le Cottage des Quatre Vents
summary: 9km from the sandy beach of Saint Martin en Countryside, detached house for 8 people with garden and animals on site.
description:
This typical Normandy farmhouse in a quiet cul-de-sac has been completely renovated by the owners. You'll appreciate the comfort of the on-site facilities and the proximity of the animals in the grounds adjoining the Holiday cottage, which will delight the whole family (ponies and dwarf goats). Hiking enthusiasts are just a stone's throw away from the GR "Pays Chemin vert du Petit Caux" leading to Eu, and the GR "Pays des Forêts de Haute Normandie" leading to Dieppe. The coast and its beaches are just 9 km away. Numerous tourist attractions nearby: Dieppe, Criel-sur-mer, Douvran Animal Park, Canadian Park with Bisons and Wolves at Muchedent, Piscine Ludibulle, Eu, Le Tréport... Bread vending machine, pétanque court and Kids' playground 5 minutes' walk from the Holiday cottage.

Please note that this Holiday cottage is not All inclusive: some options are extra.

First floor :

- Entrance hall,

- Large living room with wood-burning stove, sofas, armchair, table soccer and connected flat-screen TV (TV box and platform access with your codes),

- Fully equipped kitchen opening onto dining room with large dining table and flat-screen TV (dishwasher; washing machine, filter and pod coffee maker, large fridge with freezer...),

- Bathroom with shower,

- separate WC,

First floor :

- Landing with shower room and WC,

- En enfilade: 1 bedroom for 2 with bed 140x190cm with TV and 1 bedroom with 2 beds 90x190cm with independent staircase and TV,

- En enfilade: 1 bedroom for 2 with bed 140x190cm and TV and 1 bedroom with 2 beds 90x190cm and TV,

Outside :

Unenclosed private garden with animals nearby. Garden furniture with deckchairs and barbecue.

Board games. Baby bed available on request. Pony rides on request. Outdoor games on request: table tennis, pétanque, molky, badminton...

title: Gîte Chez Mamema
summary:
Michel, accompanied by his mother Marianne and his wife Nathalie, has completely renovated his grandmother's house to welcome you and let you enjoy the peace and quiet and the view of the Alsace Vineyard.

This fully-equipped holiday cottage is ideally located in the center of Marlenheim, close to all amenities (bakeries, shops, restaurants, public transport, etc.), and can accommodate from 1 to 12 people. Marlenheim, which has been awarded the "Stations Vertes" label, is the gateway to the Alsace Wine Route. Don't hesitate to come and stay at 'Chez Mamema' to visit this wine-growing region near Strasbourg.
description:
The price of the stay is given as an indication and varies according to the duration of the rental and the number of occupants.

It corresponds to the price of one night's rental for 12 people in low season, subject to a minimum stay of 5 nights.

Please do not hesitate to contact the owner for further information or to request a price quote.

Attic/2nd floor: one bedroom (1 double bed), a second bedroom (4 single beds), a mezzanine with library and games console, and a bathroom with toilet.

1st floor: bedroom (1 king-size bed for 2), living room with sitting area (1 sofa-bed for 2), shower room with wc and fully-equipped kitchen.

First floor: bedroom (1 double bed) and bathroom with toilet.

Heating, air conditioning and housekeeping included.

60m² terrace with garden furniture and barbecue.

Private parking for 1 car, Public parking lot a few meters away.

Access to a private reinforced recharging point for electric vehicles for €10/night.

CORONAVIRUS INFORMATION

We would like to assure you that we have put in place a number of measures to guarantee that your stay in our accommodation will be as carefree as possible:

- All the equipment at your disposal is sanitized before your arrival by a nebulization method and the use of a residue-free, odorless disinfectant long adopted in medical and hospital environments.

- Each rental is spaced at least 24 hours apart

- We clean the Holiday cottage's decor as much as possible to avoid any source of contamination.

- We wear masks to welcome you

Take good care of yourself!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: G602309
summary:
The gite is located in a typical village on the Picard plateau between Beauvais and Amiens.  You will find all shops and amenities (restaurants, bakery, pharmacy and a supermarket 9 km away...).

Less than 2 hours from Lille, Paris and its 2024 Games, accessible via the A16 freeway 10 minutes away.

Amiens and its hortillonnages and St Leu district are 40 km away.

You can discover or visit the emblematic sites of the Oise region nearby:

- 20 km from Beauvais, the Cathedral and the Maladrerie

- 30 km from Gerberoy, one of France's most beautiful villages

- 50 km from Compiègne and its Palace,

Detached 150 m² house on 2 levels for 8 people (4 bedrooms / sleeps 7 independently).

First floor: Entrance hall, large living/dining room, sitting room with fireplace (1st basket of wood included), TV (130cm). Equipped kitchen (dishwasher, microwave, induction hob, coffee maker (capsule and filter)) opening onto terrace.

Bedroom for 2 (1 bed 160x190cm), bathroom (Italian shower (1.35 x 0.8cm) with washing machine, hairdryer, separate WC.

First floor: Large landing leading to 3 bedrooms for 2 people (2 beds 90x190cm). Shower room/WC with tumble dryer.

800 m² enclosed garden with garden furniture, sunbathing area and barbecue.

Basement with garage for 3 cars.

Everything included (beds made, towels and household linen, heating, electricity, a basket of wood).

title: L'Abreuvoir
summary:
Ideal gîte for visiting Alsace, close to the forest and many hiking trails. 50 km from Colmar via Col du Bonhomme.
Local services in Saulcy-sur-Meurthe: bakery, pastry shop, grocery store. Butcher's, delicatessen. Bar, tobacconist, newsagent, grocer. Thil chocolatier. Doctor. Supermarkets 5 km away in Anould or Saint-Dié-des-Vosges.
Open-air go-karting at Gerbépal (10 km). Confiserie des Hautes-Vosges in Plainfaing (14 km).
Gérardmer and its lake 20 km away. Colmar 50 km away, via the Col or Tunnel Sainte Marie.
Nearest ski resort Le Grand Valtin 20 km. Or Gérardmer, La Mauselaine, 25 km.
description:
Attractive 109 m² renovated farm outbuilding. Separate entrance. First floor: large 43 m² living room with hearth fireplace, fitted kitchen opening onto dining room, and sitting area with TV. Separate WC.

1st floor: mezzanine with sitting area, 2 bedrooms (1 double bed, 2 single beds). 2 bathrooms: 1 with shower, 1 with bath. 1 WC. And on 2nd floor: mezzanine lounge area, 2 bedrooms (4 single beds), and 1 WC.

Large south-facing flower-filled terrace with awning, garden furniture and barbecue. Small garden. Garage.

Electric heating. Charges not included (on meter reading according to consumption, over 8 kwh included per day).

Bed linen rental compulsory for business stays: 8€ for single beds and 10€ for double beds, plus end-of-stay cleaning charge: 65€.

Free wood for the fireplace. Table tennis available.

Pets accepted at an extra charge of €4 per day per animal.

Possibility of renting the gîte for 4 people, with use of the first floor and 1st floor: - 15% discount.

Close to the owner's house (private access). Easy access, on the D58 A road leading to the Col du Bonhomme.

Petit bémol sur le chauffage électrique pour une maison de cette grandeur au vu des 8 kwh journaliers inclus qui sont peut être un peu juste par grand froid.

title: Le Baptistère
summary:
In the outbuildings of this former manor house, set in a large wooded property, we offer you our three bedrooms.

Located in the commune of Attichy in the Oise region, close to villages and historic sites such as Soissons, Compiègne (19km) and Pierrefonds. Le Baptistère awaits you for a privileged interlude during your peregrinations in the Oise region.

1 hour from Paris.  Charles de Gaulle airport 72 km. Beauvais 77 km. Reims 81 km. Amiens 95 km.Lille 170 km.

Enjoy the peace and quiet of the large park and well-exposed swimming pool.

In the outbuildings of this former manor house, in the heart of a large wooded property, we offer you our four spacious bedrooms (approx. 35 m²) equipped for 2 people with private bathroom and separate toilet.

2 rooms "Le bureau de Joséphine" and "L'atelier de Louise" are on the first floor with direct access to the outside and private terrace.

"Clémence's boudoir" is on the 1st floor of the outbuilding, with its own sitting area, TV, ethanol fireplace and private bathroom.

A 4th bedroom is located in an outbuilding of the Baptistère guest house. It is on the 1st floor and sleeps 2 (160 x200cm).

This room has a fireplace (ethanol), TV, and a private bathroom open onto the bedroom with bathtub, and separate toilet.

Wifi, parking on the property. 15x6 heated outdoor pool open from April to mid-October (weather permitting).

title: Gîtes de France® - Le Domaine du Mesnil
summary: Large Holiday cottage with Wellbeing area and gaming room 20 minutes from Forges-les-Eaux, 2 hours from Paris
description:
In Montérolier, this spacious detached house at the foot of its manor house welcomes up to 10 guests in a warm and cosy atmosphere. Featuring 4 bedrooms, each evoking a different world, the house also offers a genuine Wellbeing area with sauna, solarium and large round bed, as well as an elegant billiards room. A professional kitchen makes it easy to organize group meals. Just 20 minutes from Forges-les-Eaux, this is an ideal address for a weekend with friends, an EVJF, EVG or a small family reunion.

First floor:

- Living room with a small, fully-equipped professional kitchen (American fridge, microwave, dishwasher, filter coffee maker + percolator coffee maker),

- Games room with billiards and darts,

- Separate toilet with washbasin and washing machine,

- Solarium with sauna, double shower and rest area with round bed (usable for overnight stays, but room cannot be darkened),

- 50 Nuances de Grey" room for 2 people (double bed 160X200cm) and its mysteries.

1st floor :

- Room "Gasby le Magnifique" for 2 people (double bed 180X200cm) and its private bathroom (Italian shower and WC),

- Room "Out Of Africa" for 2 people (double bed 160X200cm) and its private bathroom (Italian shower and WC),

- Room "Les Liaisons Dangereuses" for 2 people (double bed 140X190cm) and its private bathroom (Italian shower and WC),

Outside :

- Large terrace with jacuzzi (fee for use in winter 40€/day),

- Above-ground Piscine on sunny days,

- Outdoor fireplace.

- Numerous free parking spaces,

- Possibility of renting a party room with sound system, lights, beer taps and bar (350€) from the owner,

- Horses can be seen from the Holiday cottage,

- Pets allowed but not in bedrooms,

- Reversible air-conditioning in all rooms,

- Less than 3 km from a train station.

Pontoise 22 km. Chantilly 25 km. Beauvais 32 km. Senlis 34 km. Compiègne 60 km.

3500m² enclosed garden. Table tennis.

reviews.author: AGW
reviews.title: Comfortable and atmospheric cottage
reviews.body:
When we first arrived at the property, we were not quite sure it met our expectations. This all changed when we stepped in: we immediately felt hugged by this charming and welcoming cottage. We could see the large secluded garden through the kitchen French doors, the very large dining/living room also with two French doors opening into the garden. A beautiful fireplace with logs supplied for. The house was very warm which was welcome at the end of December. The upstairs bedrooms are beautifully refurbished with excellent beds. Plenty of towels supplied which feels luxurious. Plenty of hot water in the bath/shower rooms.
There is a very large Leclerc supermarket 10 minutes away by car for food and other shopping. Lots of places of interest to see. We enjoyed wonderful long walks from the cottage into the forest. I can imagine how lovely it must be in the summer. A very enjoyable stay.

title: Gîtes de France® - Le Relais de la Charreterie
summary: Unusual stay in a gypsy caravan, close to the banks of the Seine and Jumièges Abbey.
description:
In Heurteauville, come and enjoy a unique experience in our two gypsy caravans set in a large, green, peaceful garden with a view of the animals.

Each roulotte offers comfort and privacy: top-of-the-range bedding, meticulous decoration, private terrace and a warm atmosphere.

Ideal for a romantic getaway or a relaxing break, they combine bohemian charm with modern comforts.

Nearby: Jumièges Abbey, the Heurteauville peat bog, the loops of the Seine, or the typical villages of the Pays de Caux.

A gourmet breakfast with local flavors completes this moment of escape in the heart of authentic Normandy.

Roulotte Rouge 4 persons

- Double bed 140X190cm

- Kitchen area with hob, mini-oven, fridge, filter coffee maker and kettle

- Dining area with table

- Private terrace with garden furniture and barbecue

- Cabin next to the caravan with 2X90X190cm bunk beds and Kids' play area

Roulotte Bleue 4 persons

- Double bed 140X190cm and Bunk beds 2X90X190cm

- Kitchen area with hob, mini-oven, fridge, filter coffee maker and kettle

- Dining area with table

- Private terrace: garden furniture and barbecue

Sanitary facilities and separate shower at your disposal (Key to sanitary facilities with caravan)

Breakfast room with pellet stove and sitting area with TV

Meals can be delivered by the Restaurant "La Presqu'île" (17€)

Bicycle hire and pétanque court

Spa area from April 1 to October 31, included in the rental price (reservation upon arrival)

Possibility of accommodating horses (box and paddock) and grassland

title: La Maison des Remparts
summary: This 200m² house is very pleasant to live in, with a vast living room divided into a TV corner, a relaxation area or additional sleeping area, a work area and a dining room. It is very functional, with a fully equipped kitchen, laundry room and garage for storing bicycles, for example. Set back from the road and surrounded by a 3000 m2 walled garden, it's an inviting place to relax, with a shaded terrace for convivial moments.
description:
Accommodation: you'll have the pleasure of entering their world, where everything has been designed with your comfort in mind. Each room has a double bed (140cm) with a large closet and plenty of storage space. Rooms face either the courtyard or the garden. Beds made on arrival and towels provided.

On one level, the house is functional and pleasant to live in, opening onto a wooded courtyard and a large garden. Large living room with comfortable sofa (Smart TV area), relaxation area with sofa bed for extra sleeping only, dining area. The entire house is air-conditioned. The built-in kitchen is fully equipped (fridge, oven, microwave, dishwasher, hob, coffee maker, Senseo, kettle and toaster + numerous utensils). Two bathrooms are at your disposal. 2 WCs, 1 of which is independent. Laundry room with washing machine and dryer giving access to the garage and second shower room.

Outside, table and chairs, deckchairs and plancha are at your disposal. There's also a garage for storing your bikes - the Canal de Berry cycle path is just 150 m away!

Fiber optics provide Wi-Fi and TV with a wide choice of channels, including Netflix.

Traveler access

Equipped with an electric gate, you can enter up to 3 vehicles and leave them safely in the courtyard. City center is within easy walking distance (all shops). Municipal Piscine 150 m away.

title: A la fermette de Limesle, 2 chambres, 8 personnes
summary:
Faithful to its era, with its oven, well and protective green setting, the Lismele farmhouse is a haven of peace in the heart of nature.
The bedrooms (for 1 to 4 people) are housed in a wooden extension, each with private access to the garden and terrace. Each room has a mezzanine and private bathroom.
Our breakfasts feature organic produce.
To make the most of your stay, we'll be happy to guide you on discovery tours.
Babies are welcome, and all facilities can be made available (Umbrella bed in each room).
A Bed and breakfast where you can bring your family (up to 4) thanks to the 2-level rooms with mezzanine!
And to help you relax, the Piscine is open to all with timetables, so that everyone can enjoy it to their heart's content.
Are you staying more than 2 nights in Limesle? Take the opportunity to discover the Champs du Four vineyards (2km away on foot) with your host, who will tell you all about the secrets of Mayenne wine!

Ideally located 6 km from the A81 motorway (Le Mans - Rennes), take a break for at least 2 nights (special rate -20%). La fermette is 20 minutes from Laval, and you can explore the whole of southern Mayenne: Musée Tatin with its monumental statues, Refuge de l'Arche in Château-Gontier with over 1,200 animals, the Marina, water-skiing... and of course all the activities and shops in Laval: Château de Laval and the Musée d'Art Naïf (MANA), whose emblematic figure is Le Douanier Rousseau, the Marina and all the famous music festivals.
description:
2 bedrooms:

L'Acadie (up to 4 people). LEVEL 0: Bedroom (24m²) with 1 bed 160*200, table and chairs, courtesy tray and fridge - Bathroom with shower, towel dryer, hairdryer and WC - LEVEL 1: Mezzanine (15m²) with 2 beds 90*190, armchairs.

Baby Equipment: Umbrella bed, mattress and high chair.

L'Ethnique (up to 4 people). LEVEL 0: Bedroom (19m²) with 1 bed 140*190, table and chairs, courtesy tray and fridge - Bathroom with shower, towel dryer, hairdryer and WC - LEVEL 1: Mezzanine (12m²) with 2 beds 90*190, armchairs.

Baby Equipment: Umbrella bed, mattress and booster seat.

On-site activities: garden walks, Piscine with deckchairs open from mid-May to mid-September, heated to 22 degrees (heat pump), rising in summer.

Piscine opening hours: 10am-12pm and 4pm-7pm. Piscine towels not included.

INCLUDED: Breakfast, beds made up, towels, heating, electricity, housekeeping.

SUPPLEMENT: the rate includes, for two people, the use of a double bed.

For the 3ᵉ and 4ᵉ person: a single bed each.

In the event that you are two people and wish to use two beds, a supplement of €20 per stay will be charged for the second bed (to be paid to the owner if not paid at the time of booking).

title: La Source
summary: In the heart of a lovely green valley, a stone's throw from Amboise and the Royal River, discover the charm of a fully restored 16th-century mill. This magical place, enhanced by Catherine and Philippe's warm welcome, the delicious table d'hôtes and the peaceful stream that runs alongside the property, will make your stay in the Loire Valley unforgettable.
description:
The charm of this place is apparent as soon as you step through the front door. The architecture of the house and its green setting will enable you to enjoy a stay in Touraine synonymous with serenity and conviviality. You're sure to love the house's sublimely restored character, but you'll also be delighted by its modern facilities, exquisitely hand-picked furniture and table d'hôte. The proximity of the charming town of Amboise, its castle and its breathtaking views of the Royal River, Clos Lucé, Château Gaillard and the Pagode de Chanteloup will allow you to savor some of the wonders of our region. The châteaux of Chenonceau, Chaumont-sur-Loire and Chambord also await you. Touraine is also synonymous with gastronomy, wine and cycling on the Loire à Vélo itinerary. A little further afield, the City of Tours, the castles of Villandry, Azay-le-Rideau, Loches and Chinon, and Beauval Zoo.

Superb 16th-century residence with 4 bed and breakfast rooms, each with en-suite shower room/WC and 160x200 cm bed. 1st bedroom on ground floor with totally independent access and private terrace. External access to 2nd bedroom on 1st floor and 3rd and 4th bedrooms on 2nd floor. Common relaxation/reading area available (1st floor). WIFI ACCESS. Private, secure parking on property. Small stream on the estate. At lunchtime, small "table d'hôtes" restaurant open to the public and tables d'hôtes (€28/person excluding drinks), in the evening, reserved for bed and breakfast guests (meals based exclusively on organic or local seasonal produce). Non-smoking accommodation. Quiet location ideal for relaxation and rejuvenation.
